title: Mouse Issues
body: razer naga 2014 side buttons not working when the league of legends client or in game is open

replies.body: Is Naga the one with numerous buttons on the side?  I'm not sure if they are all bindable with League, but you can try!  When in-game, tap escape and select Key Bindings and try binding those side buttons.  To update and as a clarification- only mouse buttons 1-5 may work for league on any mouse.  Hope that helps!
